import React from 'react' import './start.css' export default function Start(props) { const numberOfQuestions = props.options.amount == 1 ? `1 question` : `${props.options.amount} questions` const category = props.options.category == '' ? `all categories` : `${props.getCategory(props.options.category)} category` return (

Welcome to the Quiz!

Click the button below to start the quiz!

You will play rounds of {questions} in {category} with {props.options.difficulty} difficulty. (change options)
) }
